# **Welcome to Our Final Year Project Website!**

![](images/Screenshot%202024-02-16%20223433-01.png)

Greetings and welcome to our final year project website!

We are a dynamic interdisciplinary team from Singapore Management University (SMU), comprising talented individuals from both the Business Analytics (BA) and Smart-City Management Technology (SMT) majors. Together, we are collaborating with the Urban Redevelopment Authority (URA) to revolutionize urban walkability within Singapore's estates.
